  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1162</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1162</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La Susanna és rossa</string>
            <string language="en">Susan is fair</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Susan ist angemessen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Susan est juste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Susan é justo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Susan è giusto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Susan είναι δίκαιη</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva per identificar el so de la S sorda i el de la S sonora. Conté una presentació informativa, activitats d'autoavaluació, pràctiques i un enllaç per saber-ne més. Les activitats es poden imprimir i consultar mitjançant el portal.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive teaching unit (MUD) on differentiating between voiced and unvoiced 's'. It includes an introduction, self-assessment exercises, practice activities, and a link for further information. The activities can be printed out and checked on the website.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua catalana</string>
            <string language="en">Catalan language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua catalana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengües modernes</string>
            <string language="en">modern languages</string>
            <string language="es">lenguas modernas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ortografia</string>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
            <string language="es">ortografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Maßeinheit (SCHLAMM) 
auf dem Unterscheiden zwischen geäußert und unvoiced ' s. Sie 
schließt eine Einleitung, Selbstbewertung Übungen, 
Praxisaktivitäten und ein Link für weitere Informationen ein. 
Die Aktivitäten können auf die Web site ausgedruckt werden und
überprüft werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
différencier entre exprimé et unvoiced des 's. Elle inclut une
introduction, des exercices de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment, des activités de 
pratique, et un lien pour de plus amples informations. Les 
activités peuvent être imprimées et vérifiées le site Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A unidade ensinando interativa (LAMA) em 
diferenciar-se entre expresso e unvoiced ' s. Inclui uma 
introdução, exercícios do self-assessment, atividades da prática, 
e uma ligação para uma informação mais adicional. As 
atividades podem printed-out e verificado no Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sul 
differenziare fra espresso ed unvoiced 'le s. Include 
un'introduzione, le esercitazioni di valutazione di se stesso, le 
attività di pratica e un collegamento per ulteriori informazioni. 
Le attività possono essere stampate e verificate il Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στη διαφοροποίηση
μεταξύ του εκφρασμένου και unvoiced "s". Περιλαμβάνει 
μια εισαγωγή, τις ασκήσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης, τις δραστηριότητες 
πρακτικής, και μια σύνδεση για περισσότερες πληροφορίες. Οι 
δραστηριότητες μπορούν να εκτυπωθούν και να ελεγχθούν στον 
ιστοχώρο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katalanische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">moderne Sprachen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langages modernes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épellation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">línguas modernas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">soletração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggi moderni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ortografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταλανική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύγχρονες γλώσσες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορθογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
